body_html: With TF 1.4 release, tf.estimator.train_and_evaluate is added, as a replacement for the tf.contrib.learn.Experiment. tf.estimator.RunConfig is designed to work with the new API. Given this, close this issue.
body_text: With TF 1.4 release, tf.estimator.train_and_evaluate is added, as a replacement for the tf.contrib.learn.Experiment. tf.estimator.RunConfig is designed to work with the new API. Given this, close this issue.
body: With TF 1.4 release, tf.estimator.train_and_evaluate is added, as a replacement for the tf.contrib.learn.Experiment. tf.estimator.RunConfig is designed to work with the new API. Given this, close this issue.
